casebody.data:
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., Plaintiff,
v.
Ilirjan BIDA, Defendant-Movant. M-1089/1090 September Term 2017
080743 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for leave to appeal as within time (M-1089) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1090) is denied.
